website_summaries.verdict: This is a thick moisturizing cream that's ideal for dry skin, but works for combination and normal skin as well.
pros: Has an appealing creamy texture and is extremely moisturizing
Great for those with dry skin
It absorbs nicely into the skin leaving it soft, supple, and with a bright, even tone
cons: May be too moisturizing for daytime use if you are prone to oily skin

customer_reviews.title: Good but not transcendent
customer_reviews.text: Given the reviews (and an entire internet's worth of effusive praise for this product), I was expecting something life-changing. This is a nice rich (but not heavy) moisturizer that won't clog your pores. It will not replace your mortal human face skin with that of a newborn infant. It has that slight BO-ish scent that I've noticed from a few snail products but it goes away immediately. Given the price, this is a solid buy.
customer_reviews.author: pgvillage

customer_reviews.title: Holy grail moisturizer!
customer_reviews.text: Seriously hydrating, plumping, and smoothing. Brightening effects can be seen the longer you use this product. Benton makes products witch safe ingredients that do not sensitize skin, no fake scents or dyes!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Golembiewski

customer_reviews.title: A dream.
customer_reviews.text: I love the Snail Bee High Content Lotion so I thought to give this a try for my night cream and I am so glad I did. Super thick but absorbs well, not tacky or greasy, a GENEROUS size for a night cream and a great price all with the same great ingredients as the lotion, but amplified. You do not need a whole lot either, just a tiny little dollop about the size of a peanut is more than enough for your entire face. One tube lasts well more than 3 months.

customer_reviews.title: This cream is nice and thick
customer_reviews.text: This cream is nice and thick, but spreads well and absorbs easily into the skin. I have oily skin, so I like to use this at night as an occlusive layer on top of all of my other essences, ampoules, and serums, but before, or instead of, my sleeping pack. If I use this in the morning, it tends to make me a bit oilier than I would normally be. It has a slight scent to it, but I think this is from the ingredients themselves, not because of any added fragrance. This cream is a nice addition to my Asian skin care regimen. I will definitely be ordering this again.
customer_reviews.author: Meresankh

customer_reviews.title: The holy grail.
customer_reviews.text: I am 33, but I look maybe.. 25. And I owe it all to years of using this absolutely amazing moisturizer. This is the secret weapon ladies. I hope it does everything for your skin that it does for mine.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica P

customer_reviews.title: Great for winter
customer_reviews.text: I love this moisturizer for winter. My skin is normally pretty oily, but it gets dry in the winter. This takes away all dryness & I love that no harm comes to the snails. They just wander around on nets in the dark and the slime is collected.

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff!
customer_reviews.text: I am in my mid thirties and am conscious of moisturizing well in the morning and at night. I love snail cream, and this one is great for the night in my opinion. A little thick, it rubs in well but leaves a little residue. I feel like my skin is supple, youthful and plump.. an improvement from before I started using this product.

customer_reviews.title: HG for me!
customer_reviews.text: It is a heavy cream that can feel occulsive and sweaty at times but my skin LOVES IT! No silicones, no fragrance, no acrylates- OMG! Everything I have been looking for, sadly too heavy for daytime in the summer but I will definitely be buying it forever and shelling out for other products in this line if they are as natural as this.
customer_reviews.author: eli

customer_reviews.title: Best snail cream!
customer_reviews.text: Helped my skin and got rid of cystic acne caused by too much biotin. It does make your face feel bit warm. I'd suggest sitting in front of a fan for a few minutes after applying it so you don't sweat it off. Or just apply in on the spots where it's needed.
customer_reviews.author: RiTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: My favorite winter moisturizer!
customer_reviews.text: I love asian skin care products and I was doing a very in depth routine that had about 9 steps. Then I realized how much I hated spending that much time on my face twice a day. I cut my routine down to a few staples and this cream made the cut. It's my perfect moisturizer for winter skin. It wears well under my makeup. No foul odor, it's creamy but not too thick and it only takes about a half dime size amount to cover my face and neck. My skin breaks out easily but not with this cream. I will repurchase again and again and again!
customer_reviews.author: Erin D. Palmer

customer_reviews.title: I love this stuff so much i'm buying more products in ...
customer_reviews.text: In two weeks this cream has faded my acne scars and has started clearing up my face! I know it's not a moisturizer but it also rivals any moisturizer i've ever had. I love this stuff so much i'm buying more products in the snail bee line to try out.

customer_reviews.title: Very moisturizing
customer_reviews.text: Very moisturizing but on my dry, sensitive skin, seems to be causing a little bit of a problem when used twice-daily (little bumps pop up after hours, but do go away eventually). If you're repairing your moisture barrier, this may well help you a lot though. Helped me and has thus far been well worth the irritation.
customer_reviews.author: Kate H

customer_reviews.title: Like the Benton masks
customer_reviews.text: Like the Benton masks, this cream is very high quality and so soothing! It is great for acne, hyperpigmentation (has adenosine and niacinamide) and irritated skin. I use it twice daily and have had great results. The bee venom and snail filtrate are supposed to be excellent for skin issues. This will forever be a part of my skin care routine!
